title: APPARATUS AND METHODS FOR SINTERING
fig_desc: The term “cylindrical susceptor” is a structure 113 as shown in FIG. 1 having a length that is coextensive and corresponds to the coil 111, an outside diameter OD, an inside diameter ID that can contain a heating zone and a workpiece, and a wall thickness
all_fig_descs: The term “cylindrical susceptor” is a structure 113 as shown in FIG. 1 having a length that is coextensive and corresponds to the coil 111, an outside diameter OD, an inside diameter ID that can contain a heating zone and a workpiece, and a wall thickness
component_labels: cylindrical or hollow sleeve furnace apparatus
